id: scenario-value-scanner-idd-community-scenarios-educational-participating in civic education and voting preparation
did: did:web:elohim.host:content:value-scanner:idd-community:scenarios:educational-participating in civic education and voting preparation
title: Participating in civic education and voting preparation
description: Participating in civic education and voting preparation
content:
Scenario: Participating in civic education and voting preparation
    Given Jordan is a citizen with the right to vote
    And informed voting requires accessible civic education
    When election season approaches and Jordan wants to vote
    Then the educational_elohim provides voter education in accessible format
    And candidates and issues are explained with simple language and visuals
    And Jordan learns about voting process step-by-step
    And Jordan can make informed voting choices with support
    And Jordan's civic participation is enabled through education
    And Jordan experiences full citizenship through accessible learning
